title: Paternal obesity induces changes in sperm chromatin accessibility and has a mild effect on offspring metabolic health
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Iasim Tahiri, Sergio R. Llana, Júlia Fos-Domènech, Maria Milà-Guash, Miriam Toledo, Roberta Haddad-Tóvolli, Marc Claret, Arnaud Obri
